description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can provide you with enough thrust to take off into the air. When you form your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.QoCQEVNtgMhsElwQ]{Sheath Array (Ex)}, you can spend a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{Nanite Surge (Ex)} to gain a fly speed equal to your base speed with average maneuverability. If you already have a fly speed, it increases by 10 feet instead.

Select and enable the appropriate fly speed in the Modifiers tab.

modifiers.name: Lifting Nanites - Gain Fly Speed
modifiers.notes:
When you form your sheath array, you can spend 
a nanite surge to gain a fly speed equal to your base speed 
with average maneuverability. If you already have a fly speed, 
it increases by 10 feet instead.

modifiers.name: Lifting Nanites - Increase Fly Speed
modifiers.notes:
When you form your sheath array, you can spend 
a nanite surge to gain a fly speed equal to your base speed 
with average maneuverability. If you already have a fly speed, 
it increases by 10 feet instead.
